#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	ll m;
	cin>>m;
	ll arr[m];
	for(ll i=0;i<m;i++)
	cin>>arr[i];
	sort(arr,arr+m);
	if(arr[0]!=arr[1])
	cout<<arr[0];
	else{
	    ll i;
	for(i=1;i<m-1;i++)
	if(arr[i]!=arr[i+1] && arr[i]!=arr[i-1]){
	cout<<arr[i];
	break;
	}
	if(i==m-1)
	cout<<arr[m-1];
	}
	cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
